column5: Just make sure you file down any points, and stay away from sports events and power lines, you should be ok Chris.

Well that'd be counter productive as it's designed after the Egyptian pyramids for it's obvious healing powers, points are essential!  On the other hand I've discovered that changing fuses in the main panel while standing under the grounded copper plumbing warrants it's temporary removal!
I'm specchless, but i do see the reason behind the discovery.
You believe what ever lets you sleep well at night Pete!! That is all that matters... but I can tell you that they're going thru an amazing quantity of aluminum oxide...
Crap.....another sleepless nite watching you writing lewd limerics in the sky with Brian giggling in the co pilots seat
We've been keeping weather records for what maybe two hundred years? We have no idea what mother nature is capable of doing.
Simon,,,Yer startin to freak me out over here.

No need to freak out Paul. There are a number of 'survivors' on this board. Some know, some don't.  Some are multiple century, some are not. I think/know you are one of us. You just need to let your mind go free and clean. You should sleep well tonite and pm me in the morning.  Slayer

i just think its the way things go.  The earth heats up and cools down naturally or by events such as asteroids/meteors/humans.  It will heat up then cool off again and while she does this she rocks and rolls all areas at certain times.  Cant prevent it.  One day there will be no glaciers to melt, then one day she will be covered in ice once again.  Enjoy everyday is what I say!  Cheers!
Is Skeeter one of us too
Skeeter is on another team. You never found it suspicious that he leaves for weeks at a time then returns as though he never left?
For sure not.   But Roy knows.
No Way !!!!!!!!!!!!!!! So Skeeter is from the "Other side"? I'll be darned. Of course you know...i wont sleep tonite everyone
Sleep well and don't worry about anything Paul. Skeet is harmless....in fact, protecting us from the nasties is his regular function. He's a surveillance/monitor unit. We call'em the tincans.
You guyz is nutz
No, that's Dann 2 years ago at Lakair trying to watch Facts of Fishing one morning.
"Just put de lime in de coconut and drink it all up, put de lime in de coconut and then you'll feel better..."

I dreamed i went back in time and was trying to teach the chinese rocket makers to seed clouds to make rain.Roy and Simon, were there making sure that i was doing it right, and Wayne and Brian were flying around in Waynes float plane, sky writing dirty limericks overhead  Thanks a Million
One thing is for sure, we need some friggin rain! The Notty looks like a small creek ever since they started watering the potatoe fields last week.
This. Tim's a very astute fella and an okay fisherman.

Wayne you are whacked out and need some serious rest. As a pilot you know that contrails will linger in the sky when the humidity levels are high and take a  long time to dissipate. When the air is dry they dissipate much faster. Chemtrails is a hoax.
Oh NO! Now they've captured Squid's mind!
I have some HD tinfoil free for any member wanting to protect themselves and thier famillies.

Here we go......... Conspiracy theories abound. Like one of the Rockefellers said a few years ago before 9/11, 'don't worry about what you can't control, just take care of yourself and your family'. Tune into Alex Jones and watch Jessie 'The Body' Ventura's show. You'll be stockpiling food and munitions in no time.
That explains the ringing in my ears for the last while.
Back in my day...during the cold war...we used to blame the Russians for playing their radios too loud and upsetting the weather patterns...
Ok MY Turn!!---MY Turn!!!  Ready?????  Comet Elenin  Google Nasa'S Jet propulsion lab site-----it's comin

You mean this ?  “Behind the comet, discovered in December last year, Chinese scientists say that is something they called cluster, which means globular cluster, or perhaps alien spacecraft,” said Toscano.  According to the report quotes the astronomer mission, the space body would be found in the comet’s tail and was analyzed after the mysterious signals that came off of an unknown formation “strange and obscure.”  In the words of Toscano, the Chinese have said that the spacecraft is stationed in the same place for ninety days, ”before that looked like it was coming from an extraterrestrial civilization,” said Argentine scientist.  According to the Daily Chronicle, this phenomenon was corroborated by Rosie Redfiel, the new director of the Program of NASA’s Astrobiology. ”But when NASA began to make calculations and projections of orbit of the comet, they realized that something was wrong and the first thing they did was remove the website which provided information on this issue,” said Toscano

Ya thats the one  Better hope she does'nt go into a speed wobble when it goes around the sun and heads for us  Apparently Nov 2011  Ya did'nt here it from me that the sky is fallin---too many fish to catch  This is right outta Star Trek--beam me up Scotty  True story though----Recently a rock missed earth by about 80,000 miles---not far I guess in space  Nobody told us----when it went by it made ABC nightly news----apparently small nugget about size of 10 story building----had it hit us would have been equivalent to many Hiroshima bombs  Just in case I'm bein really nice in case our card gets called in
I'll be fine regardless, I've swapped out my aluminium foil hat for one made of 1/4" plate.  I'm however confined to the house during electrical storms.....

So much rain and floods. Then it,s fires totally out of controll.Its all around the world. Dont give me 2012 crap or global warming.  Everyday on the news, you see flooding,heavy rains and tornados. Much more then I can ever remember seeing.   We are ruining our earth.
2012 Brian.
You've none to worry bouts til the 4 horsemen show up on yer doorstep, my son.
mother nature getting even for all we messed up
Google chemtrails and you'll know more than you want to. USA/UN protecting us from ourselves by attempting to control the weather by 2012.
so you are saying I shouldn't worry about my boat screwing up..breaking down....cause we won't live to be mad about it

While I'm a firm believer in climate change and don't think it should be ignored at all, I can't help but think the information age we live in accounts for what you're seeing. Pre-internet times would you have heard about a wildfire or flooding on the other side of the world?

Just to put into perspective-back in the twenties my mother used to go swimming in May and said the water was warm(north of Ottawa) -my grandfather, a tug boat captain on the great lakes(1900-1950)said the ice out was later and later every year -Myself and everyone else lived thru the cuban missile crises and a few other defcon 5 events -the volcano eruption in iceland last year did more damage to the environment than man could do in 20 years NOTHING changes as fast or as often as the weather,and as soon as someone thinks they have it figured out nature will change the rules.  vance

Geez Wayne....i wish i had never read that  As if i'm not paranoid enough as it is.NOW, i have to order some of that heavy duty aluminum foil so they cat see into my somewhat atrophyed brain.  Thanks alot
where's Lundboy when you need him

Yah got that right Dan !!! As for Chemtrails, I know positively it's going on. Last 3 years as far North as New Liskeard... maybe even further. Last 8 years or more over Georgian Bay around Midland/Collingwood, etc. Of course they've been aerial seeding clouds for decades, but this is on a MUCH larger scale. I've witnessed as many as 5 tankers at a time laying down one mile grids, turning the spray on and off while they built their "checker board".  Only shots I have access to right now... they're not contrails. Contrails dissipate... these ones spread out and form cloud layer. Pics taken from our front deck in Penetang.
My thoughts aswell Dan. Maybe he was way before our time.Maybe then agian,Irish is him.

Exactly! They were still happening, we just didn't hear about it. Today there is an earthquake in Japan and we hear about it before the ground stops shaking. Christ, I still remember phones that you had to turn the crank on then ask Betsy to connect you to brock 329 (or whatever). I remember when the first steam engine came into our town, everyone showed up to see it.  Today on tv I saw a copier that that can actually copy and recreate a working 3D tool c/w moving parts and usable. Spave travelers will no longer have to carry tools or parts with them, just a file and the material to actually construct the part.
I still call them steam shovels, Cliff.
It was no different in the 15th century as I remember.

Been looking down the rabbit hole have we?  I looked but have more questions than answers.  Don't know if you've seen any of the documentarys out there on the subject, but heres a couple. I'm hesitant to even post the links on OFC but here goes nothing.  http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ZoKkebpzu7Q  http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=HxNeoXkL0mM  Theres another one out there called "What In The World Are They Spraying" but haven't watched it yet.
LOL.. like I said I know positively it's going on. A brother with 20 years as a squadron commander in CANFOR and friends in Pearsons control tower. Can't say anymore than that...
.............nevermind. Dont wanna go there tonite
Cut it out Wayne, yer scaring my dogs They dont like when daddy hyper-ventilates
Sorry Paul.. didn't mean to have you out lying in your yard all day tomorrow staring up at the sky !
I'm gonna wear a poncho everywhere i go now. Dont wanna get the overspray all over me. Dang !!! i wish i didnt read that

Yes, weather modification was the conclusion I came to, seeing as to the UN outright admits it.... Then you can take a turn  down the other path and it just gets down right disturbing. Just ask Mr. Carnicom..... www.carnicom.com .....

Most of the big storms I have seen here,the clouds seem to be cris crossing. To me thats not natural.They also seem to alot closer. I have heard of this waves put into the air that causes these storms.
It's truth Paul. News just took a while to reach us back then. I remember building a Cathederal.......
